simplifiedChinese.title: Tried, Crucified & Buried
simplifiedChinese.Question1: What can you learn from Jesus about how he faced suffering and injustice?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: What did Peter say when he was asked if he was one of Jesus' disciples? Why do you think he answered this way?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: Imagine how Peter felt in this story? When have you felt similar emotions? How did you respond?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: Spend some time talking to God about your personal experiences regarding suffering, injustice and denial. Allow God to lead you to an appropriate response.
